website_summaries.verdict: A gorgeous crossbody made with attention to detail and an affordable price tag.
pros: Bag is made of waterproof and sturdy PVC material
Inside, a fabric lining provides contrast for easy visibility when retrieving items
The strap can be adjusted, and the interior is separated into 3 convenient compartments
cons: Strap is not wide enough to evenly distribute weight

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is perfect. Compact enough yet still enough room to carry everything. The 3 compartments helps keep everything organized and easy to find plus it gives you more room. The top zippers make it easy to open while still wearing it instead of having to lift up a flap like alot of other crossbody purses. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag it works well for the women who ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag it works well for the women who takes her security serious. I did have some minor problems with the zipper pockets. I still love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, not useful
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bag but zippers stick, it’s a real struggle to open and close. I got compliments on how cute and “springtime” it was, but hard to use zippers means I never carry it anymore☹️
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girls

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, and was great at keeping a variety of ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a more secure purse for a trip to Europe, but couldn't stand the thought of using a dorky "traveler's" purse, and this delivered 100% for what I needed. It looks great, and was great at keeping a variety of things in different compartments!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Meyers

customer_reviews.title: and this was the perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law loves her new purse. She needed a cross-body, and this was the perfect size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Crossbody Clutch
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. Beautiful construction and lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Organized!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and organized bag. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Moviepartner

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I excepted it to be a little smaller. It is very square, but also very fitting purse. Good if you travel
customer_reviews.author: Anya Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, looks and feels like a nice purse
customer_reviews.text: Little purse that hold a lot. Great quality, looks and feels like a nice purse. I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Lauffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse, it has 2 zippered pockets where I put things that I do not use as much. The middle pocket has a clasp closure where I put things that I use thee most. It is easy to open and close. It also has an open pocket on the outside of the purse.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate to a purse auction. Got a good deal on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality purse, but it’s obnoxiously big, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Clark

customer_reviews.title: The bag is just as described and very adorable! It does stay firm to its shape
customer_reviews.text: The bag is just as described and very adorable! It does stay firm to its shape, unlike many crossbody purses that kind of form around your hip/thigh. But there's plenty of room for anything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hack

customer_reviews.title: That would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the accents were in silver in stead of gold. That would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ybnormal

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my wife. She likes it. Compact, but roomy, easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: its probably a nice purse for other people but it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice replica👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not original but a great replica especially for the price. Good size, color and material! Different compartments and not too bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Joa Tav

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, practical, roomy. I was expecting a smaller purse, but i love that is bigger. The color and the photos are true.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.DianaBP
